item.title: Akka Dispatcher
item.description: The engine of Akka as it decides when a actor should process messsages and when it must yield the thread for others. It means that dispatchers are in control of the thread time and of the threads themselves. Dispatcher (default): Event-driven dispatcher, sharing threads from thread pool. PinnedDispatcher: Dedicated thread per actor. CallingThreadDispatcher: Just for testing. The best tips are: Adjust throughput to deliver more messages to the actors before yielding.
